title: Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve: Professional Development
body: Professional Development        Teacher Workshops Meet with other teachers, scientists and specialists to learn more about park resources, experiment with activities for your classroom and prepare for a field trip to the park. A variety of workshops for educators are offered throughout the year.  All Teacher Workshops   Workshop    Natural History Workshop Learn More     Teacher-Ranger-Teachers The national Teacher-Ranger-Teacher program offers classroom teachers a stipend to work in a national park, develop curriculum and share their park experience with their students. Find out more about this opportunity... All Teacher-Ranger-Teachers   TRT    Teacher-Ranger-Teachers Learn More     Suggested Reading Access our park Education Plan and other resources that help our Rangers learn more about the park. All Suggested Reading   Resource Guide    Geology Guide Learn More
